de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.index.lsh.hashfamilies

Interface LocalitySensitiveHashFunctionFamily<V>

  • Type Parameters:
    V - Object type
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractProjectedHashFunctionFamily, CosineHashFunctionFamily, EuclideanHashFunctionFamily, ManhattanHashFunctionFamily

    public interface LocalitySensitiveHashFunctionFamily<V>
    LSH family of hash functions.
    Since:
    0.6.0
    Author:
    Erich Schubert

      Generate hash functions for the given relation.

      Get the input type information.
